header_text: You are playing a board game with a couple of friends. You are trying to place your piece onto the board but your chorea is making it difficult to play on the specific spot. Your turn is taking longer than your friends', so you are worry they are getting annoyed.

elements.text: After playing a couple more rounds, you speak to your friends. They tell you that regardless of your symptoms, time spent with you is...

elements.name: You are playing a board game with a couple of friends. You are trying to place your piece onto the board but your chorea is making it difficult to play on the specific spot. Your turn is taking longer than your friends', so you are worry they are getting annoyed._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
